author: MetalBikez

text:
Loved this game, one of my favorites on the console. Even if it still felt like an "Okami-light", I was surprised by its high production values. Awesome graphics, great sound quality and a perfect stylus interface for the brush mechanic.

Anyways, I'm back from NYC, loved it. I bought a bullet bill belt buckle (that's a lot of Bs) from the Nintendo Store too! It's strange how I'm always super busy when I have to make a x00 video for this list. I'll try to do my best with the little time I have.
author: SupraDarky
